basic_information.scholarship_name: Peggy Kates Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: Mission: Scholarship will benefit a student majoring in Chemistry. Eligibility Requirements Must be majoring in Chemistry Must have a 3.5 GPA Must have completed 60 credit hours Two letters of recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
